slides.contentText:
Welcome to my Fiori portfolio!
Feel free to take a look at some of my spare-time projects/investigations :)

Social tiles
In this Launchpad there is a Fiori Catalog destined for social media, composed of custom Fiori Tiles :)

Season mode plugin
In addition, there is also the inclusion of a Season Mode plugin, in charge of adapting the theme according to the current time of the year :)
A bunch of other stuff behind-the-scenes here and many things to show up here in the future... depending on my free time / masochism / (eternal) will to explore new things! :)
